Dreadlocks are a hairstyle that is made by intentionally entangling hair in a certain way.
Dreadlocks are strands of hair that are matted together.
The dreads are a hairstyle worn by people with dreadlocks.
Dreadlocks are a hairstyle that is created by letting the hair naturally mat into locks.
Dreadlocks are matted coils of hair.
The girl has a dreadlock hairstyle.

Dreadlocks are matted coils of hair. Most dreadlocks are usually intentionally formed; because of the variety of different hair textures, various methods are used to encourage the formation of locks such as backcombing, braiding, rolling and the crochet hook method.
dreadlocks are a hairstyle that does not require any chemicals.
Dreadlocks, also locs, dreads, or in Sanskrit, Jaṭā, are ropelike strands of hair formed by matting or braiding hair.
Dreadlocks, also locs, dreads, or in Sanskrit, Jata, are ropelike strands of hair formed by matting or braiding hair.
A dreadlock, also loc, dread, or in Sanskrit, Jata, is a type of hairstyle.
